abstract: Ivan Obradović (Serbian Cyrillic: Иван Обрадовић; born 25 July 1988 in Obrenovac) is a Serbian footballer who plays for Belgian club Mechelen, as a left back.
comment: Ivan Obradović (Serbian Cyrillic: Иван Обрадовић; born 25 July 1988 in Obrenovac) is a Serbian footballer who plays for Belgian club Mechelen, as a left back.
